DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial study palliative care intervention improve symptom control quality life patient stage II-IV non-small cell lung cancer family caregiver . Palliative care program provide patient caregiver information manage symptom , maintain health well-being , access supportive care service . An interdisciplinary palliative care model may effectively link lung cancer patient appropriate supportive care service timely fashion .
